title: Ty Segall Goes 3-D On 'Mr. Face'
teaser: Ty Segall's new EP comes on two 7-inch discs that double as a pair of 3-D glasses.
contentencoded:
Ty Segall is 27 years old, and he does it all â€” writes, sings, produces, plays guitar and drums. He's released a large amount of music over the past decade, solo albums as well as working with other bands. Fresh Air rock critic Ken Tucker reviews Segall's new four-song EP, Mr. Face, and tries to get a fix on Segall's productivity.
